abstract: American gymnast Danell Leyva wins gold medal in men's parallel bars at gymnastics world championships in Tokyo, first gold by an American man at event since 2003.
snippet: Danell Leyva, a 19-year-old from Miami, won a gold medal in the parallel bars at the world championships in Tokyo, the first by an American man at the meet since 2003.
lead_paragraph: Danell Leyva, a 19-year-old from Miami, won a gold medal in the parallel bars at the world championships in Tokyo, the first by an American man at the meet since 2003.
